Reviews.Title: we love our Power Pro X500
Reviews.Author: lovetoread
Reviews.Content: What a wonderful camera and bundle for the price.  We are very satisfied.  Used it to photograph our wedding and honeymoon, and have hundreds of wonderful pics to share!

Reviews.Title: Love Our New Camera!
Reviews.Author: ldsjengreen "I love books!"
Reviews.Content: We purchased a camera for two reasons: one, my camera is about 5-6 years old and two, we're having a new baby and really wanted something that would last as well as take really good pictures of our new addition.  We have a few weeks left before she gets here but we've tried it out a few times and LOVE IT! I was really excited about this purchase because it came with everything we needed as far as a case, memory card, and battery - all of which could have increased out purchase price significantly elsewhere.  Our package was shipped and delivered in just a few days of ordering, which was very nice. If I ever need a new camera I know where I am going to purchase it and from whom BeachCamera.com!

Reviews.Title: Amazing product! Steal of a deal!
Reviews.Author: cln85
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome, and the accessories that come with this set are incredible! All you need to get started! Aaannnd, I almost paid for the 1-3 day shipping, but decided to just go with the standard FREE shipping, and to my surprise it came in just TWO days! Could have come with a better manual, but all in all, GREAT DEAL! I LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: Awesome bday present!!
Reviews.Author: immacoconut
Reviews.Content: I got this as a surprise bday present from my fiancee in afghanistan. I had researched different cameras. I wanted a bridge camera and this one had great reviews and for good reason. It takes great pictures in auto or manual mode. For a professional I'm sure this is less than expected but beign an amateur who just want to take great pictures, this is great. I also bought a tripod seperately and it attaches just fine to it. Everything that came in the bundle was in great packaging and just what you need.  Love this camera!

Reviews.Title: Great value for the price
Reviews.Author: Alan E. Hebert
Reviews.Content: I have owned this camera for only one week, not long enough to explore all of it's features.  I have used it in it's fully auomatic mode and I am extremely pleased with it's performance and results.  It is an excellent step up from a pocket size point- and- shoot model.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Cop55
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my wife as bridge camera.  It works well for most applications but the ability to use it for close up shots is non existent.  She has tried to use it to take pictures of jewelry for her business and it just does not measure up on anything closer than five or six feet away.  Good for learning without spending a lot of money on some of the better known brands.

Reviews.Title: pixel problem
Reviews.Author: rae
Reviews.Content: When I received the camera I noticed a pixel was out. It doesn't show up in the pictures and it's a wonderful camera it reached my expectations. Only problem was the pixel being out when I received it.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Erica Mohr
Reviews.Content: bought this as a starter camera for my 9 year old son to learn learn videography and shoot the behind the scenes on my video shoots-Quality nothing like my 5 or 7D canon, but the price was right and it is good for what its worth...I like it and he loves it!

Reviews.Title: very reliable ..
Reviews.Author: Jose L
Reviews.Content: i really like this camera it really was waht i expected ..i mean for the price ..very good product ..batteries last me close to 10 days using it daily.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA!!
Reviews.Author: mdenton
Reviews.Content: BOUGHT THIS CAMERA FOR MY DAD TO USE. IT IS VERY EASY TO UNDERSTAND AND THE BUTTONS ARE EASY TO RECOGNIZE. IT'S EVERYTHING YOU WANT IN A SMALLER BUT EFFICENT CAMERA.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: rudeboyshuffling "Elvis Bailey"
Reviews.Content: This is excellent for the price and it takes awesome pics.The ppl with some negative reviews need to go through the manual properly,because at first i was like its a mess,but when i inserted the dvd manual and learn how to use the camera properly it is GREAT

Reviews.Title: what a steal!
Reviews.Author: Debbie K
Reviews.Content: the pricing i was wary of but wanting a nicer camera. this camera takes great up close shots and clear videos. The only thing i have to remind myself of is flipping open the flash to use it.

Reviews.Title: Great deal and we are pleased
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Errichetti
Reviews.Content: We purchased along with the camera and then dorve off withthe camera bag on the bumper of the jeep therefore I re-purchased it. Well worth it as all these things purchased alone would cost over $84.00

Reviews.Title: was a good deal
Reviews.Author: Beth Moore
Reviews.Content: i chose three stars because the bundle was missing the tripod. i bought this as a gift and wa dissappointed that something was missing. the bundle is a very good price and there is a lot of functions with the camera. The user manual is a little confusing but after that second cup of coffee was more understandable. if you are looking for a good camera bundle "if it all shows up" this is the one to get

Reviews.Title: It's what I spected
Reviews.Author: Mario Hernandez
Reviews.Content: It's what I spected I used it as a gift for my daughter and worked well, no complaints found on this

Reviews.Title: A great buy!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Murray
Reviews.Content: This camera is wonderful and the price was fantastic!  I love all the extras it came with and the camera itself is easy to use and takes a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Perfect starter kit for my daughter!
Reviews.Author: Carrie
Reviews.Content: This is a great starter ensemble for my daughter. Included everything she could need. It is weighty too, not the lightweight flimsy plastic models you get for this price. Really happy so far.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: DAN MARTINEZ
Reviews.Content: I needed a smaller camera for a quick point and shoot so I bought this one. I am still learning how to use this. Some of my pictures have a blur to them. Maybe a tripod would help me with this. The price was right!

Reviews.Title: Steal of a Deal
Reviews.Author: Ellie
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a gift to my son last year at Christmas.The price was right and the camera is top quality.

Reviews.Title: My Daughter LOVES Her first time Camera
Reviews.Author: Brian D Lockhart
Reviews.Content: My Daughter started to have an interest in Photography, so I searched for a great Beginner Camera. This Bundle is everything you could want in a single package and takes great Pictures. She is completely happy with everything she received!The Seller and Shipping was Stellar with no issues What So Ever!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Andrea Fowler
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to use to take my step daughters senior pictures.  It amazing...very impressed.  For the price and everything that came in the bundle, it is well worth the price. I would highly suggest this to anyone....right price and shipping was fast and I used standard shipping.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera and Package Deal
Reviews.Author: 1mikeglv
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time, camera and accessories as described by dealer. Packaged well, everything arrived in perfect condition. I decided to buy this camera from the reviews I had read by many previous purchasers, versus other models, prices and capabilities. This camera is even better then I thought it would be. Takes excellent photos in auto mode, yet has so many various features that it will probably take me months to figure them all out even with the user manual that comes with the cameras software CD. The accessary package is surprising as well, with Camera Bag, 16GB memory card, USB adapter, rechargeable batteries and charger, lens cleaner and oh yeah...one thing that I (we) found funny, actually comical, is the "tripod" that comes with the package, albeit, functional, it's smaller then the camera, I'll keep it around just for laughs if nothing else. Five stars still goes to this dealer, for service and product. If I were to add anything to be fair, I've only had this camera for about 2 weeks now and really haven't found anything that I didn't like about it. (Saw some reviews that mentioned problems with the lens cap being loose, no such problem with mine, it fits snug). Note too, for more technical information about the camera, it would probably be better to rely on other reviews. In short, I'm very pleased, should anything change about that I will post it accordingly in an updated review.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera and accessories!
Reviews.Author: Charity Clark
Reviews.Content: I'm just going to do a pros and cons list.Pros-Good colorPanorama modeAccessory kitCons-Not rechargeable battery packTripod isn't what I expected but my grandfather gave me oneCame with 16GB SD cardOver all it's an amazing camera. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected..
Reviews.Author: JM
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife who loves taking many pictures.  She loves it but does say it uses the batteries rather fast.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: The camera is great. I love it. The pictures come wonderfully. I just took a bunch of pictures for my nephew's 1st birthday and printed them off at home. The quality is great!  It was shipped and I received it in one day! I didnt even pay of express shipping, so thank you to the company who.sent it!!!! We are going on our honeymoon in a couple weeks, it will come in handy when we go whale watching!

Reviews.Title: Take great Pics.
Reviews.Author: Paul D. Welch Jr.
Reviews.Content: One of the best Cameras I have ever used.  It takes great pictures, is easy to understand and operate,  and is a great value.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Jenny Pond
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a non-professional photographer. I have two kids, and needed a good camera to take pictures. The camera, and the price is just amazing.. I will say it was alot smaller then I had thought that it was going to be, but still great. I actually like that it's not huge and bulky. I'm so happy I ordered it!

Reviews.Title: If you want something easy to use - go for something else
Reviews.Author: StocksNation "Stocksnation"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this thinking it would give me a point and shoot experience as well as something manual if I wanted.  But I couldn't get the focus to work correctly unless it was perfect lighting and no one moving.  I tried to return it but since I didn't have the original box (it was given to me as a gift) Beach Camera wouldn't take it back.....kinda sucks. Now I have a camera I don't know how to use.

Reviews.Title: Pro x500
Reviews.Author: Gary Baker
Reviews.Content: Christmas for my daughter, she loves it. It's a great starter camera for her, and easy on the wallet. Lot's of functions and the kit I ordered was well worth the price paid. Shipping was good also.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: Wife is taking lots of pic's with it. Just wish the batteries didn't have to be removed for charging. Took it out today and no batteries, they were back home in charger.

Reviews.Title: GE Power Pro X500 16MP
Reviews.Author: AC
Reviews.Content: Arrived quickly. Not as easy to use as I thought it would be. Still having issues getting clear pictures. Have followed advise found on amazon reviews. Hopefully it will start to get easier to use and will get better pictures.

Reviews.Title: Made a hit
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: Gift for young girl wanting to get into the business of taking pictures * * * * * * * *

Reviews.Title: I I love this camera
Reviews.Author: Barbara T. Cogdell
Reviews.Content: I have taken photos for 45 years..I have used many brands , nikon, cannon and etc. However I find this camera to be one of my favorites..I love the styling and the white color..The photos are beautiful..the camera is easy to use..I get many compliments on it..I see no reason to change to anything else now..I am so happy with it. So glad I purchased it..I fully recommend it.

Reviews.Title: A little disappointed
Reviews.Author: Mary N. Prinz
Reviews.Content: I am a novice photographer and really need a point and shoot camera.  I decided to go with this camera because it had the high zoom, and the white one is so cool looking.  The camera seems to take decent pictures, but...It is an odd bulky shape, not something you can just throw in your pocket.  The lens cap is an issue, it doesn't stay on very well, and if you attach it to the camera with the strap, it sometimes falls in front of the lens, blocking the pictures.  The manual for the camera is on a computer disk, and it would be much easier to read and understand if there was a printed book.  I think the directions are not easy to understand.  The camera has a lot of great options, I just can't figure out how to use them.  Also, many times the picture does not look good on the camera screen, but looks fine once it is downloaded?  I also forget to turn the flash on, as you have to open the flash manually each time you turn the camera on.  I have tried to take outside night time pictures twice, and they don't turn out at all, just black.  I have already told my husband I want a new point and shoot for Christmas, either the newest Kodak model or the sony cybershot.
